title: Factorial Recursion

explanation.analogy: Like Russian dolls - each level unwraps until you reach smallest doll.

title: Fibonacci Recursion

explanation.analogy: Each rabbit pair breeds based on pairs before. Classic!

title: Sum to N Recursion

explanation.analogy: Stack coins - add current on top of smaller stack.

title: Power Recursion

explanation.analogy: Each level multiplies x once more.

title: GCD Recursion

explanation.analogy: Keep finding remainder until nothing left.
explanation.complexity: Time: O(log n), Space: O(log n)

title: Reverse String Recursion

explanation.analogy: Two people swap positions, then inner pair swaps.

title: Check Palindrome Recursion

explanation.analogy: Check if outer letters match, then check inner.

title: Print 1 to N Recursion

explanation.approach: Recurse first (go down), then print (coming back up).
explanation.analogy: Dive to bottom, print on way back up.

title: Print N to 1 Recursion

explanation.analogy: Print on way down the stairs.

title: Sum of Array Recursion

explanation.approach: Add last element + sum of rest.
explanation.analogy: Take last item, add to smaller pile's sum.

title: Find Max Recursion

explanation.approach: Compare last element with max of rest.
explanation.analogy: Find champion of smaller group, compare with last person.

title: Count Digits Recursion

explanation.analogy: Peel off one digit, count it, repeat.
explanation.complexity: Time: O(log n), Space: O(log n)
